title: Peloton Interactive Successfully Sues Women’s Cycling Community for Use of Word ‘Peloton’
content:
'It was David versus Goliath': 'The Women's Peloton' group forced to change name or pay 500 euros per day after fitness giant files lawsuit.

Read the full article at Peloton Interactive Successfully Sues Women’s Cycling Community for Use of Word ‘Peloton’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
